item.title: My little space on the net
item.author: Dennis T Kaplan
item.description:
Here you will find mostly documentation for some of the things I have coded.
Improvements and/or bug reports are encouraged.
Go ahead feel right at home, at the top is the main menu pointing to each project.

Unless otherwise specified within the code, most everything you can find here is MIT licensed. The link to the generic license is in the Meta menu.

This website has been created with hugo a Go program that converts markdown files to a complete website.
